subject: This is Disturbing ...
author: mllejade
full_text:
Hello all -- Came across this article.  Does anyone know if this is true and/or received any messages via their boxes concerning this?

http://exopolitics.blogs.com/breaking_news/2011/04/rev-kevin-annett-genocide-of-canadian-aboriginals-at-25-million-50000-children-now-missing-key-witness-william-coombes.html

Sharon from SF
